WRITING.TEXT: NOTE: Okay, wow. Didn't really expect to get top spot on the front page :3 Good to see how much others appreciate this scene too.

I read somewhere that UBW is supposed to be a bit of an improved experience after Zero. I was also intending switching UBW and Zero around as an option just so ya know. What's wrong with the one I already put up may I ask?
Sorry, just new to the ordeal is all... I haven't even started anyways.

WRITING.TITLE: Tips on how to manage the anime you watch?
WRITING.TEXT:
Got any? For example stuff like balancing multiple series, utilising the watch time you have, managing larger series, etc.
A few of my own:
- Largely focus most either on a large series while dotting into smaller ones, or speading out the bigger ones and managing more focus upon smaller ones.
- Pick shows that appeal most to you and you think are worth watching.
- Plan your routes to avoid complication and series ends being failed to be tied up.
- If you can't finish something like an episode or movie, you can always keep track of where you left off and pick up the next time you're free.
Lore is just a cheap tactic to make weaker rips stronger.
What is this, a parallel universe?
